workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.11825592216061515 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.10000811747026728 --weight-decay 0.0007798189126058669 --lr 6.420556724102088e-05 --lr-scheduler inverse_sqrt --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --min-lr 1e-9 --warmup-updates 132688 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.06043323645105845 --max-update 3500000 --max-epoch 15 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
